instruct: A slight cultural inflection with clear authority.
personas.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
personas.ref_text: 几天在浴室书写时,面对着镜子,突然发现左上角的头发闪立一丝营光。是窗外照进来的阳光反射吗?我用梳子剥博,营光还停在同一个地方,臭金镜子一条,原来是一根白头发。我用手翻翻头发,想看看是不是还有其他的白发,或是半白半黑的头发。我现在倒草对立找银针似的刘博者发丝,没有,他是唯一的一根。这是头一会发现自己长了根白发,我好奇的用手调弃他,透过镜子仔细观察。这跟头发看起来有点像是龙口粉丝般浅白透明

instruct: A deep, gravelly, rhythmic Western drawl.
personas.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
personas.ref_text: This that the White Man calls charity is a fine thing for widows and orphans, but no warrior can accept it, for if he does, he is no longer a man and when he is no longer a man, he is nothing and better off dead.

instruct: A deep, gravelly, rhythmic Western drawl.
personas.text: LISTEN...... pilgrim. I said...... don't *ever*...... touch that saddle again.  I think...You'd better...WATER my horse,
personas.ref_text: This that the White Man calls charity is a fine thing for widows and orphans, but no warrior can accept it, for if he does, he is no longer a man and when he is no longer a man, he is nothing and better off dead.

We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
